---
title: "Matias Leandro Andina's CV"
author: Matias Leandro Andina
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
params:
  pdf_mode:
    value: true
  show_aside:
    value: false
  include_sections: [
    "education",
    "skills", 
    "academic_articles", 
    "teaching_positions", 
    "software",
    "awards", 
    "mentoring"] # toggle on-off interactively or run with params from outside. Order here is not order in CV
output:
  pagedown::html_resume:
    css: ['dd_cv.css', 'resume']
    self_contained: true
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  results='asis', 
  echo = FALSE
)

library(magrittr) # For the pipe
source("cv_printing_functions.r")

# Read in all data and initialize a CV printer object
CV <- create_CV_object(
  data_location = "data/",  
  pdf_mode = params$pdf_mode
)

# filter data !
CV$entries_data <- CV$entries_data %>% dplyr::filter(in_resume == TRUE)

```


```{r setup_sections, include=FALSE}
# All section IDs used in your CV â€” long and short
all_sections <- c(
  "education",
  "research_positions",
  "academic_articles",
  "teaching_positions",
  "conferences",
  "awards",
  "mentoring",
  "talks",
  "service",
  "software",
  "data_science_writings",
  "skills"
)

# For each section, compute whether to include it and store in a named list
include <- lapply(all_sections, function(sec) {
  sec %in% params$include_sections
})
names(include) <- all_sections
```

```{r}
# When in pdf export mode the little dots are unaligned, so fix that with some conditional CSS.
if(params$pdf_mode) {
    cat("
<style>
:root{
  --decorator-outer-offset-left: -6.5px;
}
</style>")
}
```



# Aside

```{r, results='asis'}
if (params$show_aside) {
  cat(knitr::knit_child('sidebar.Rmd', quiet = TRUE))
} else {
  cat("
<style>
  .aside {
    display: none !important;
    width: 2 !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
    background: none !important;
  }

  :root {
    --sidebar-width: 2px !important;
    --content-width: 90% !important;       /* expand main content */
    --decorator-width: 0px !important;      /* optional: shifts the timeline spine */
  }

  /* In pagedown templates Content is often placed inside .main / .content */
  .main, .content {
    max-width: 100% !important; 
    width: 100% !important;
  }

</style>
")
}
```
